package construct;

public class Character {
    String name;

    int life;

    int level;

    public Character(String name, int life) {
        this.name = name;
        this.life = life;
        this.level = 50;
    }

    public Character(String name, int life, int level) {
        this.name = name;
        this.life = life;
        this.level = level;
    }
}
